meanings.sent1: The unbriefed students were confused during the test.
meanings.sent2: She felt unbriefed about the upcoming changes at work.
meanings.sent3: The unbriefed puppy kept chasing its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The unbriefed travelers wandered aimlessly through the unfamiliar city.
meanings.sent5: The unbriefed hikers got lost in the dense forest.

meanings.definition: Not given a summary or overview
meanings.sent1: The unbriefed report left the team puzzled about the project.
meanings.sent2: He was unbriefed on the details of the meeting agenda.
meanings.sent3: The unbriefed movie left the audience scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her unbriefed mind was like a jumbled puzzle with missing pieces.
meanings.sent5: The unbriefed instructions led to a lot of confusion among the participants.
